result.eng: The men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ga: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.orig: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guail
result.html: Chaith na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ na fir a saol ag baint guailThe men spent their lives mining coal.

result.eng: Did she have a long life?
result.ga: An raibh saol fada aici
result.orig: An raibh saol fada aici
result.html: An raibh saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?
result.ponchtml: An raiḃ saol fada aiciDid she have a long life?

result.eng: Life as it was a long time ago.
result.ga: An saol mar a bhí fadó
result.orig: An saol mar a bhí fadó
result.html: An saol mar a bhí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.
result.ponchtml: An saol mar a ḃí fadóLife as it was a long time ago.

result.eng: Now that the product exists, we must start marketing it.
result.ga: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caithfidh muid tabhairt faoin mhargaíocht
result.orig: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caithfidh muid tabhairt faoin mhargaíocht
result.html: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caithfidh muid tabhairt faoin mhargaíochtNow that the product exists, we must start marketing it.
result.ponchtml: Anois agus an táirge ar an saol caiṫfiḋ muid taḃairt faoin ṁargaíoċtNow that the product exists, we must start marketing it.

result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.html: Bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.eng: Healthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.
result.ga: Bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláin
result.orig: Bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláin
result.html: Bíonn an spórt ina dhlúthchuid den saol ag daoine atá folláinHealthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn an spórt ina ḋlúṫċuid den saol ag daoine atá folláinHealthy people have sport as an intergral part of their lives.

result.eng: She spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ga: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.orig: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sin
result.html: Chaith sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ sí a saol ar fad i mbun na hoibre sinShe spent her whole life doing that work.

result.eng: How does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ga: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil
result.orig: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil
result.html: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ponchtml: Conas a ullṁaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taoḃ amuiġ den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?

result.eng: When I came to the world.
result.ga: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saol
result.orig: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saol
result.html: Nuair a tháinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ṫáinig mé ar an saolWhen I came to the world.

result.eng: I don't believe in the other world.
result.ga: Ní chreidim ar an saol eile
result.orig: Ní chreidim ar an saol eile
result.html: Ní chreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.
result.ponchtml: Ní ċreidim ar an saol eileI don't believe in the other world.

result.eng: The whole world knows who you are.
result.ga: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.orig: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusa
result.html: Tá a fhios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.
result.ponchtml: Tá a ḟios ag an saol mór cé tusaThe whole world knows who you are.

result.eng: The ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.
result.ga: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta
result.orig: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochta
result.html: Tá an gnáthshaol róghránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríochtaThe ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.
result.ponchtml: Tá an gnáṫẛaol róġránna i gcomparáid le saol na litríoċtaThe ordinary world is too ugly compared to the world of literature.

result.eng: You have a great life!
result.ga: Tá saol iontach agat
result.orig: Tá saol iontach agat
result.html: Tá saol iontach agatYou have a great life!
result.ponchtml: Tá saol iontaċ agatYou have a great life!

result.eng: The life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.orig: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibrí
result.html: Níorbh aon ghaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ghnáthoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ġaisce ná údar mórtais saol an ġnáṫoibríThe life of an ordinary worker was nothing to be proud of.

result.eng: Her life is falling apart.
result.ga: Tá a saol ag titim as a chéile
result.orig: Tá a saol ag titim as a chéile
result.html: Tá a saol ag titim as a chéileHer life is falling apart.
result.ponchtml: Tá a saol ag titim as a ċéileHer life is falling apart.

result.eng: She was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.
result.ga: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-Eabhrac
result.orig: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-Eabhrac
result.html: Bhí sí an-ghníomhach i saol na hiriseoireachta i gCathair Nua-EabhracShe was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí an-ġníoṁaċ i saol na hiriseoireaċta i gCaṫair Nua-EaḃracShe was very active in the world of journalism in New York City.

result.eng: In the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ga: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.orig: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bith
result.html: I saol dorcha na spiaireachta ní féidir bheith cinnte de rud ar bithIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: I saol dorċa na spiaireaċta ní féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte de rud ar biṫIn the dark world of espionage, you cannot be sure of anything.

result.eng: It was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ga: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.orig: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighis
result.html: Níorbh aon ionadh gurbh é an saol acadúil a bhí i ndán don bhuachaill óg agus a mháthair ina dochtúir leighisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.
result.ponchtml: Níorḃ aon ionaḋ gurḃ é an saol acadúil a ḃí i ndán don ḃuaċaill óg agus a ṁáṫair ina doċtúir leiġisIt was no surprise that an academic life was in store for the young boy when his mother was a medical doctor.

result.eng: They were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ga: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.orig: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saol
result.html: Liosta le háireamh a bhí iontu tráth den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].
result.ponchtml: Liosta le háireaṁ a ḃí iontu tráṫ den saolThey were a considerable list once [ie. there were a lot of them].

result.eng: Life was getting hard for them.
result.ga: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.orig: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthu
result.html: Bhí an saol ag cur cruaidh orthuLife was getting hard for them.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an saol ag cur cruaiḋ orṫuLife was getting hard for them.

result.eng: If only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ga: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.orig: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith mé
result.html: Mo chreach agus mo chrá gan mé chomh hóg leatsa inniu Chaithfinn saol nár chaith méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.
result.ponchtml: Mo ċreaċ agus mo ċrá gan mé ċoṁ hóg leatsa inniu Ċaiṫfinn saol nár ċaiṫ méIf only I was as young as you today. I'd spend my live differently.

result.eng: When everybody was asleep...
result.ga: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.orig: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.html: Nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeaḋ an saol fá ċónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
